data.decision: Phase 1.2 hardening roadmap: (1) Smoke suite as hard gate, (2) guardrail_skipped visibility, (3) skills_used hygiene warnings, (4) Decision outcomes as next compounding upgrade
data.rationale: Prevent silent rot. Every improvement needs a test, every test defends future-you. Visibility on guardrail blocks catches gaming. skills_used hygiene prevents silent omissions. Decision outcomes graduate system from task performance to judgment quality.
data.context: Phase 1.1 complete with 4-test smoke suite. System now compounds automatically but needs hardening to prevent regression and add visibility.
